description._content: The Philippines doesn't rain everywhere like this on rainy season .I was surprised seeing this ,but this was at Balanan ,up the mountains.At low lying areas ,it was pretty dry and so humid . ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ This is a message for general viewers ,not just contacts but for people across the board ,even those not registered in flickr who may stumble on this page . Matthew 24:21 "There will be a lot of misery at that time, a kind of misery that has not happened from the beginning of the world until now and will certainly never happen again." This is Biblical prophecy verse,you better read Matthew 24 and the whole Chapter itself to make it more understandable .Biblical signs are happenning nowadays at fast accelerated pace .So many markers everywhere .Watchers like myself are continually tracking these things . Your mainstream media normally avoids the real news so you will not panic or scared to death .You watch your football ,sports hero ,your beautiful singing idols , soaps , holiday -travel programmes , all those mind numbing programs on TV ,as if things are all the same as it was .Well if you think nothing but all the same as it was,then you must well be dosy ,past asleep or truly blind. If you don't have Christ and is certain you are save,you'll be afraid ,be very afraid of the times ahead. If you are afraid of death ,then you aren't save. Because if you have Christ in your heart and is born of Christ in the spirit ( a truly born -again christian ) there is no fear in you and of whatsoever to befall on you and your family at latter days,even death . If we see evil now ,this isn't the evil which is described that will happen during the tribulation days .I do believe we are at the birth pangs yet,though we don't know how long this be and the degree of anguish and disaster it will take the world over. The evil we see now are yet little tasters of days to come . When the restrainer is taken away ,the Holy spirit which takes control of things of this world as of this time ,it will be hell break loose.This was all said in the Biblcal terms thousands of years before.If you didn't continue partying , fornicating or succomb to temptation of the adulterous Jezzibel spirit , you'd never fall sleep, even to much extent mocking and making ridicule ,ignoring the warnings of God . Some do believe once stature and knowledge can save them, believing almost they are like gods ,little gods. Don't even think of the "end time" idea if you don't like it,but just think if your breathe of life be taken away any time today ,where you are going to spend your eternity. It is something you don't have to speculate ,rather be sure where you stand today and where you are spendin your eternity . Man has a spirit and this is eternal element of man. If you don't have Christ Jesus truly in your life and you're not born in the spirit ,then you are lost spiritually. I know this is a heavy talk but I'd rather have people poked and nudge ,even offended if only this message could help wake them up ,than go my quiet comfortable way and flatter them nicely to hell . If you don't have Christ ,you better seek Him truly now before it's too late. I am doing this with loved and as a work for Christ to share the gospel by any means ,even through this little corner in flickr.That when I face God in the beama seat of judgement of saints ,I knew I have done something for the Lord and never embarrased at any time to admit I am a Christian and I'm with Jesus here in flickr . Bizarre News : Oregon: Farmer Eaten By "Zombie Hogs" Bible Signs! Michigan State University Professor Running Naked In Class "There Is No (Beep) God ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Sign of The Times Videos * The Heart of Disobedience - Psalm 82 "Ye are gods" of ClayEudaly * World War 3 Scenario report: Oct. 1/2012 (Part 1) * Muslim Brotherhood Looks To Overthrow The King of Jordan. Bible Prophecy! If these all happen ,Jordan is islamized raging against Israel just as what is happening with the government of Egypt today, which is exactly the scenario leading to the fulfilment of the Psalm 83 war where Israel wll be attack from all sides and alone in this coming war. Isn't the word of God true ,shaming all those which dicredit the Bible .What would happen to America ,we don't know .But this is what the scene would look like. Bible prophecy orientated christians are watching things unfold in our very interesting times. We should not be afraid to see dark things happening ,even real persecutions of true christians which uphold the true teachings from the world of God to come to pass.
